DOC.brief_summary: To extend the duration of peripheral nerve blockade after major foot and ankle surgery the investigators randomize the postoperative treatment with either perineurial sciatic nerve blocks with 0.5% Bupivacaine-Epinephrine with or without Dexamethasone.
DOC.brief_title: Protracted Mixture of Local Anesthetics for Major Foot and Ankle Surgery
DOC.criteria: age > 17 scheduled major foot and ankle surgery written informed consent fertile women in anti conceptive treatment fertile women not in anti conceptive treatment, but with negative urinHCG on day of surgery patients not able to understand or cooperate allergies to medicines involved daily buse of steroids daily use of opioids
